title: Fanum Voltumnae
description: A shrine of Voltumna that served as the chief religious center of Etruria. The Etruscan League (duodecim populi Etruriae) was said to meet annually at the shrine.

properties.description: The archaeological excavations of the site of Campo della Fiera have been posited as the definitive location of the Fanum Voltumnae. Location based on OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of Campo della Fiera
